feed.title: Yamtrack Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.22.1
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed home page not loading: KeyError: "Property 'unit' not found for media type 'movie'." #434 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/c2b58c3ef3efe613b42162aea3b6d041af4fd92d)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.22.0...v0.22.1

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.22.2
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed movie events migration to handle unique constraint conflicts #435 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/823a65fcd0a56925981977e0d52400aa703c067a)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.22.1...v0.22.2

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.22.3
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed events migration files #435 #436 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/cfd502bea13220a857e26eaf8f972d9d2e61b4a5)
  • Update sample search URL to handle season media type (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/06625061875934dc018b8f9039aed506925b90ce)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.22.2...v0.22.3

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.22.4
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed error on home page when having unreleased movies/games as In Progress (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/c31116be2161e3bc07894148901f833b6b318555)
  • Fixed logging when updating game progress from the home page (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/d486b90804bc51e48efcc2ad5d05554a6531477e)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.22.3...v0.22.4

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.22.5
entry.content:
Features

  • Enhanced sorting logic on home page to consider both primary criteria and last watched. This will only track changes made after this update as the last watched timestamps is newly added #227 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/a5a334cf621527988b60052eabfdc9b889304f61)
  • Added a “About” tab on the settings page, shows some details of the project and the version of the hosted app #439 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/0cfcb0625ad17ea38c5f1061b8c3b9109c7fc375)

Fixes

  • Fixed sorting by episodes left on the home page when none of the media have known released content #438 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/70562f5e10d11a650f9fb9cf950302e7f3d1a14c)
  • Fixed importing from Simkl with duplicated media ids #437 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/6f34432b95de1dc6f2f25dc1065529e0afa3dd9f)
  • Fixed media list not loading when filtering from an empty media list to a status with items. (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/d076677a05925bbb16392abcc0e1fd343d75c4fe)

Other

  • Added optional TRAKT_API environment variable for importing from Trakt (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/35835b58b2ef405a97e97d6e203a068befa2ecc0)
  • Moved the documentation on Environment Variables to the Wiki page (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/f61147f2671dc32d4ead7808ceac8d7b7d473ee0)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.22.4...v0.22.5
